verses.roman:
udvege divasa nā yāya 'kṣaṇa' haila 'yuga'-sama
varṣāra megha-prāya aśru variṣe nayana

synonyms: udvege—by great agitation; divasa—day; nā—not; yāya—passes; kṣaṇa—a moment; haila—became; yuga-sama—like a great millennium; varṣāra—of the rainy season; megha-prāya—like clouds; aśru—tears; variṣe—fall down; nayana—from the eyes.
translation: "In My agitation, a day never ends, for every moment seems like a millennium. Pouring incessant tears, My eyes are like clouds in the rainy season.
